i18n.title: Asynchronous Functions to Promises
i18n.description: In this lab, we will learn how to convert an asynchronous function to return a promise using the promisify function. This will allow us to write cleaner and more readable code by avoiding callback functions. We will also explore the use of currying and the rest operator in JavaScript.

meta.title: JavaScript Promisify Function | Asynchronous Programming
meta.description: Learn how to convert asynchronous functions to return promises using the promisify function, and explore JavaScript features like currying and the rest operator.
meta.keywords: JavaScript, Promisify, Asynchronous Programming, Currying, Rest Operator
